name: Tiger Tank (itch)
description:
description

This is a World War II themed tank battle game, players can drive different types of tanks to fight the enemy.Houses, stones, and tank wrecks in the scene are all obstacles that can be positioned to avoid enemy fire. The game's science and technology research and development system, provides 4 major types, a total of more than 30 tanks for players to upgrade research and development, can let players know a lot of tank knowledge
